result.html: Thug tú an freagra mícheartYou gave the wrong answer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug tú an freagra míċeartYou gave the wrong answer.

result.eng: She gave them food an drink.
result.ga: Thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.orig: Thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.html: Thug sí bia agus deoch dóibhShe gave them food an drink.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí bia agus deoċ dóiḃShe gave them food an drink.

result.eng: She gave good advice to the girls.
result.ga: Chuir sí comhairle mhaith ar na cailíní
result.orig: Chuir sí comhairle mhaith ar na cailíní
result.html: Chuir sí comhairle mhaith ar na cailíníShe gave good advice to the girls.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sí coṁairle ṁaiṫ ar na cailíníShe gave good advice to the girls.

result.eng: I had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ga: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.orig: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm

result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ tuairim dá laġad orm cad ba ċóir dom a ḋéanaṁ aċ ċuir sise coṁairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.

result.eng: The book gave me food for thought.
result.ga: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.orig: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.html: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh domThe book gave me food for thought.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an leaḃar áḃar maċnaiṁ domThe book gave me food for thought.

result.eng: The professor gave an interesting lecture.
result.html: Thug an t-ollamh léacht shuimiúilThe professor gave an interesting lecture.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an t-ollaṁ léaċt ẛuimiúilThe professor gave an interesting lecture.

result.html: Thug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.

result.eng: I gave him permission to sit down.
result.ga: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.orig: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.html: Thug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.

result.eng: He gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ga: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.orig: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.html: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sé geall dom go dtiocfaiḋ sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.eng: She gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ga: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.orig: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.html: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heaċtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.

result.eng: She gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.
result.ga: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm
result.orig: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm

result.eng: They gave her some pocket money.
result.html: Thug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais

result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: They gave the Irish-language community something to read.
